sentences.english: The larvae feed on the tender leaves and cause injury to Mahonia leveileana shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲取食嫩葉，對闊葉十大功勞造成嚴重損害。

sentences.english: It stood hardy and strong, and occasionally sprung a tender new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 它勇敢而堅強地挺立着，時而長出一片新的嫩葉。

sentences.english: The elm trees before Court Leys were beginning to burst into leaf.
sentences.chinese: 萊伊府第房子前面的榆樹開始長出嫩葉。

sentences.english: Spinach leaves on a layer of hair, very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜的嫩葉上有一層絨毛，很有趣。

sentences.english: They like eating leaves and fruits.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡喫嫩葉和各種水果。

sentences.english: What becomes of the handful of leaves from the young tree which is sawed off at the root?
sentences.chinese: 一棵年輕的樹被大齊根鋸了，它的一撮嫩葉怎樣了呢？

sentences.english: In current paper, using the tender leaf- segment as explants, the tube propagation of Begonia coccinea was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以竹節秋海棠的幼嫩葉作外植體進行了組織培養。

sentences.english: Now the first leaves of spring are unfolding.
sentences.chinese: 現在，春天初生的嫩葉正在發芽。

sentences.english: The rubber-plant in the bucket had sprouted new leaves.
sentences.chinese: 盆裏的橡皮樹已經長出嫩葉。

definition: to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
